import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { schemesAPI } from '../services/api'; import { Scheme } from '../types'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Loading from '../components/Loading'; const Dashboard: React.FC = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [schemes, setSchemes] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); useEffect(() => { const fetchSchemes = async () => { try { const response = await schemesAPI.getAllSchemes(); if (response.success) { setSchemes(response.data || []); } else { setError(response.message || 'Failed to load schemes'); } } catch (err) { setError('Network error. Please try again.'); console.error('Dashboard error:', err); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; fetchSchemes(); }, []); if (loading) return ; const eligibleSchemes = schemes.filter(scheme => scheme.status === 'active' && scheme.category ); const eligibilityScore = eligibleSchemes.length > 0 ? Math.round((eligibleSchemes.length / schemes.length) * 100) : 0; // Profile sections for the Profile tab const profileSections = [ { title: 'Personal Information', icon: 'üë§', items: [ { label: 'Full Name', value: user?.name, icon: 'üè∑Ô∏è' }, { label: 'Phone Number', value: user?.phoneNumber, icon: 'üì±' }, { label: 'Date of Birth', value: user?.dateOfBirth, icon: 'üéÇ' }, { label: 'Age', value: user?.age ? `${user.age} years` : 'Not specified', icon: 'üìÖ' }, { label: 'Gender', value: user?.gender ? user.gender.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + user.gender.slice(1) : 'Not specified', icon: '‚ößÔ∏è' }, ] }, { title: 'Location Details', icon: 'üìç', items: [ { label: 'State', value: user?.state, icon: 'üèõÔ∏è' }, { label: 'City', value: user?.city, icon: 'üèôÔ∏è' }, { label: 'Address', value: user?.address, icon: 'üè†' }, ] }, { title: 'Professional Information', icon: 'üíº', items: [ { label: 'Occupation', value: user?.occupation ? user.occupation.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + user.occupation.slice(1) : 'Not specified', icon: 'üëî' }, { label: 'Annual Income', value: user?.annualIncome ? `‚Çπ${user.annualIncome.toLocaleString()}` : 'Not specified', icon: 'üí∞' }, ] }, { title: 'Government Documents', icon: 'üìÑ', items: [ { label: 'Aadhaar Number', value: user?.aadhaarNumber ? `**** **** ${user.aadhaarNumber.slice(-4)}` : 'Not provided', icon: 'üÜî' }, { label: 'PAN Number', value: user?.panNumber || 'Not provided', icon: 'üí≥' }, ] } ]; // Activity stats for overview const activityStats = [ { label: 'Schemes Applied', value: '12', icon: 'üìù', color: 'bg-blue-500' }, { label: 'Approved Schemes', value: '8', icon: '‚úÖ', color: 'bg-green-500' }, { label: 'Pending Applications', value: '3', icon: '‚è≥', color: 'bg-yellow-500' }, { label: 'Total Benefits', value: '‚Çπ45,000', icon: 'üí∏', color: 'bg-purple-500' }, ]; return (
